--- title: "About Us" image: image/profile.jpg about: template: jolla links: - icon: github text: Github href: https://github.com/ersatz-production --- Ersatz Production is a production company (association) based in Fribourg, Switzerland. It was founded in 2024 by four people from different professional backgrounds, but united by a common desire: **Going Beyond Established Frameworks**. Whether documentary or fiction films - short, medium or feature-length - TV or web series, podcasts, music or live art, our aim is to promote and create audiovisual works with cross-media approach ambitions, while supporting bold and innovative artists. ::: {.cell} ::: ::: grid

Rani Gillioz

Vice-President

Rani Gillioz is a filmmaker. He is the author of several short and feature films, including "L'Innommable (The Unnameable)". He works as a translator.

www.swissfilms.ch

Vincent Lettry

President

Vincent Lettry is an English and History teacher. He is passionate about telling stories and podcasting.

www.linkedin.com

Matthias Klee

Secretary

Matthias Klee is an actor and a writer. He is fond of arts, philosophy and Japanese culture.

ersatzproduction.com

Layal C. Lettry

Treasurer

Layal C. Lettry handles the groundwork and administrative tasks. She is a data scientist and an economist, maintaining the whole infrastructure of Ersatz Production.

lclettry.com
